This machine was made to test more than 2 final states. The machine has alphabet a b c d, 
and has 3 accepting final states, with 1 rejecting final state.
a, b, d are accepted, while any other input (c, ad, bb) are rejected. 

delta function:
d(q0, a) = (q1, a, R)
d(q0, b) = (q2, a, R)
d(q0, c) = (q3, c, R)
d(q0, d) = (q4, a, R)

final states: (q1, q2, q4)

The following inputs (a, ad) behave as expected:
11D1011011011011D101110111011011D1011110111101111011D1011111011111011011F110111011111
11011111D1011011011011D101110111011011D1011110111101111011D1011111011111011011F110111011111

The following inputs (b, d) go into an infinite loop when they should accept:
111D1011011011011D101110111011011D1011110111101111011D1011111011111011011F110111011111
11111D1011011011011D101110111011011D1011110111101111011D1011111011111011011F110111011111
1110111D1011011011011D101110111011011D1011110111101111011D1011111011111011011F110111011111

The following input (c, bb) goes into an infinite loop when they should reject:
1111D1011011011011D101110111011011D1011110111101111011D1011111011111011011F110111011111

[[fixed]]
